content.text: I'm looking for someone to talk to, do you have a few minutes?
I do, what would you like to talk about?
I'm not sure what to talk about, I'm just feeling a little down and I thought maybe a conversation would help.
I'm sorry you're feeling down, I'm here to listen if you want to talk about it.
Thanks, I really appreciate that. I'm just not sure what's wrong with me.
It's okay to not know what's wrong, sometimes just talking about it can help.
I guess I'm just feeling lost, like I don't know what I'm doing with my life.
That's a common feeling, I think a lot of people feel that way at some point in their lives.
Yeah, I guess it's just hard to figure out what I want to do with my life.
It's okay to not know what you want to do, you have plenty of time to figure it out.
Thanks, I needed to hear that. I'm just going to take it one day at a time and see what happens.
That's a good plan, just focus on what makes you happy and the rest will fall into place.
No problem, I'm always here if you need someone to talk to.
